title: Solving the Mystery Around the Patriots Offense
description:
Nora Princiotti and Steven Ruiz team up to try to figure out some of the mystery around what the Patriots offense is going to look like this season. They discuss who they think is going to call plays and what that could look like, expectations for Mac Jones in Year 2, and more.

Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Conor Nevins
